name: Jeep Driving Simulator
description:
Start your nitro speed jeep and enjoy every day a new journey. In this game different task gives to you. When you complete your first task then next one is ready for you. Being a professional driver follow all the driving rules. Drive jeep carefully and park it in right destination in given time. Avoid to hitting obstacles because if you hit anyone your level will be failed and the game is over.

Smooth controls steering, clutch and brake pedals provides you comfortable driving experience. A tons of levels. Every level is unique in its kind.

How to play:
- Move staring left and right to control tractor.
- Use accelerator pedal to increase speed.
- Gear is for forward and reverse.
- Use gear lever up for forwarding and down for reveres.
- Use brake pedal to stop.
- Pause button to stop game at any time.
- Camera button for adjusting camera angle.
- Clear every level with 3 stars for getting more tractors.
- Play anytime and anywhere: without internet access.
